snippet: Russell Martin was a pivotal part of the Yankees victory Sunday over the Orioles long before he lifted a fastball from Orioles closer Jim Johnson to break a tie in the ninth.
abstract: New York Yankees catcher Russell Martin's performance on defense plays as big a role in Yankees victory over Baltimore Orioles as his tie-breaking home run in the ninth inning.
lead_paragraph: Russell Martin was a pivotal part of the Yankees victory Sunday over the Orioles long before he lifted a fastball from Orioles closer Jim Johnson to break a tie in the ninth.

headline.seo: Russell Martin Stars in Yankees Victory Over Orioles
headline.main: Russell Martin Stars on Defense, Too
headline.print_headline: Russell Martin Stars on Defense, Too
